tvdb: Chris asks Tess about her healing powers, then cuts his arm and asks her to heal him. She cries he shouldn't hurt himself (not just physically but emotionally) and he breaks down in tears. She heals his wounds and leaves before Jack and Lucy arrive. Ricky tells Stephen and Marissa he's quitting because he doesn't want their chairty.
